text: No e yimɓe Defte ɓen, on mo halfiŋtaa jawdi wonayndi KINTAAR, on jonnite ndi; hino e maɓɓe kadi, on mo halfiŋtaa "diinaaru", on jonnitataa ma ndu si wanaa a darani mo daŋkaranni-ɗaa. Ɗum non, ko tawde kamɓe ɓe wi'i: "Laatanaaki men e humammbinneeɓe ɓen laawol"; hiɓe taƴa penaale huma e Alla hara kamɓe hiɓe anndi
